name: PKCanvasView
desc: A view that captures Apple Pencil input and displays the rendered results in an iOS app.

items.name: var delegate: PKCanvasViewDelegate?
items.desc: The object you use to respond to changes in the drawn content or with the selected tool.

items.name: protocol PKCanvasViewDelegate
items.desc: Methods for monitoring drawing related changes in a canvas view.

items.name: var tool: PKTool
items.desc: The currently selected tool used for drawing.

items.name: var isRulerActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a ruler view is visible on the canvas.

items.name: var drawingPolicy: PKCanvasViewDrawingPolicy
items.desc: The policy that controls the types of touches allowed when drawing on the canvas.

items.name: enum PKCanvasViewDrawingPolicy
items.desc: Constants that you use to specify the type of drawing gestures your app permits while the user draws on the canvas.

items.name: var drawingGestureRecognizer: UIGestureRecognizer
items.desc: The gesture recognizer that the canvas uses to track touch events.

items.name: var drawing: PKDrawing
items.desc: The data object that the canvas uses to store drawn content.
